verses.verse: Now it fell on a day, <S%H3117><s%> that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young man <S%H5288><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> "Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>' garrison, <S%H4673><s%> that is on the other side. <S%H5676><s%>" But he didn't <S%H5046><s%> tell his father. <S%H1><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> part of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> under the pomegranate tree <S%H7416><s%> which is in Migron: <S%H4051><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men; <S%H376><s%>

and Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> Ichabod <S%H350><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Phinehas, <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eli, <S%H5941><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Shiloh, <S%H7887><s%> wearing <S%H5375><s%> an ephod. <S%H646><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> didn't <S%H3045><s%> know that Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was gone. <S%H1980><s%>

Between the passes, <S%H4569><s%> by which Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> to go over <S%H5674><s%> to the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>' garrison, <S%H4673><s%> there was a rocky <S%H5553><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> on the one side, <S%H5676><s%> and a rocky <S%H5553><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> on the other side: <S%H5676><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Bozez, <S%H949><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H259><s%> Seneh. <S%H5573><s%>

The one <S%H259><s%> crag <S%H8127><s%> rose up <S%H4690><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> in front <S%H8127><s%> of Michmash, <S%H4363><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> in front <S%H4136><s%> of Geba. <S%H1387><s%>

Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the young man <S%H5288><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> his armor, <S%H3627><s%> "Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go over <S%H5674><s%> to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of these uncircumcised. <S%H6189><s%> It may be that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will work <S%H6213><s%> for us; <S%H4622><s%> for there is no restraint on Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> or by few. <S%H4592><s%>"

His armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H6213><s%> "Do all that is in your heart. <S%H3824><s%> Turn <S%H5186><s%> and, <S%H3824><s%> behold, I am with you according to your heart."
Then Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H5674><s%> we will pass over to the men, <S%H582><s%> and we will reveal ourselves to them. <S%H1540><s%>
If they say <S%H559><s%> thus to us, <S%H1826><s%> 'Wait until we come <S%H5060><s%> to you! <S%H5975><s%>' then we will stand still in our place, <S%H5927><s%> and will not go up to them.

But if they say <S%H559><s%> this, <S%H5927><s%> 'Come up to us! <S%H5927><s%>' then we will go up; for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into our hand. <S%H3027><s%> This shall be the sign to us. <S%H226><s%>"

Both <S%H8147><s%> of them revealed <S%H1540><s%> themselves to the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H5680><s%> the Hebrews are coming out <S%H3318><s%> of the holes <S%H2356><s%> where they had hidden themselves! <S%H2244><s%>"

The men <S%H582><s%> of the garrison <S%H4675><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> to us, <S%H3045><s%> and we will show you something! <S%H1697><s%>" Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his armor bearer, <S%H5375><s%> "Come up <S%H5927><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me; <S%H3068><s%> for Yahweh has delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> climbed up <S%H5927><s%> on his hands <S%H3027><s%> and on his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: <S%H5307><s%> and they fell before <S%H6440><s%> Jonathan; <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> killed <S%H4191><s%> them after him. <S%H310><s%>

That first <S%H7223><s%> slaughter, <S%H4347><s%> which Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and his armor bearer <S%H5375><s%> made, <S%H5221><s%> was about twenty <S%H6242><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> within as it were half <S%H2677><s%> a furrow <S%H6776><s%>'s length in an acre <S%H4618><s%> of land. <S%H7704><s%>

There was a trembling <S%H2731><s%> in the camp, <S%H4264><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and among all the people; <S%H5971><s%> the garrison, <S%H4673><s%> and the spoilers, <S%H7843><s%> they also trembled; <S%H2729><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> quaked: <S%H7264><s%> so there was an exceeding great <S%H430><s%> trembling. <S%H2731><s%>

The watchmen <S%H6822><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> in Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> looked; <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H1995><s%> the multitude melted away, <S%H4127><s%> and <S%H3212><s%> scattered. <S%H1986><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him, <S%H6485><s%> "Count now, <S%H7200><s%> and see who is missing <S%H1980><s%> from us. <S%H6485><s%>" When they had counted, behold, <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan and his armor bearer were not there. <S%H5375><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Ahijah, <S%H281><s%> "Bring the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> here. <S%H5066><s%>" For the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at that time. <S%H3117><s%>

It happened, <S%H7586><s%> while Saul talked <S%H1696><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that the tumult <S%H1995><s%> that was in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on <S%H1980><s%> and increased: <S%H7227><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the priest, <S%H3548><s%> "Withdraw <S%H622><s%> your hand! <S%H3027><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him were gathered <S%H2199><s%> together, <S%H935><s%> and came to the battle: <S%H4421><s%> and behold, <S%H376><s%> every man's sword <S%H2719><s%> was against his fellow: <S%H7453><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> confusion. <S%H4103><s%>

Now the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> who were with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> as <S%H8032><s%> before, <S%H865><s%> and who went up <S%H5927><s%> with them into the camp, <S%H4264><s%> from all around, <S%H5439><s%> even they also turned to be with the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> who were with Saul <S%H7586><s%> and Jonathan. <S%H3129><s%>

Likewise all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who had hidden <S%H2244><s%> themselves in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fled, <S%H5127><s%> even they also followed hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
So Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day: <S%H3117><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> by Beth Aven. <S%H1007><s%>

The men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were distressed <S%H5065><s%> that day; <S%H3117><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> had adjured <S%H422><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Cursed <S%H779><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> any food <S%H3899><s%> until it is evening, <S%H6153><s%> and I am avenged <S%H5358><s%> of my enemies. <S%H341><s%>" So none of the people <S%H5971><s%> tasted <S%H2938><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%>
All the people <S%H776><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the forest; <S%H3293><s%> and there was honey <S%H1706><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> the ground. <S%H7704><s%>

When the people <S%H5971><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> to the forest, <S%H3293><s%> behold, <S%H1706><s%> the honey dropped: <S%H1982><s%> but no man put <S%H5381><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> the oath. <S%H7621><s%>

But Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> didn't <S%H8085><s%> hear when his father <S%H1><s%> commanded <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with the oath: <S%H7650><s%> therefore he put forth <S%H7971><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> who was in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and dipped <S%H2881><s%> it in the honeycomb, <S%H3295><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> to his mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were enlightened. <S%H215><s%>

Then one <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Your father <S%H1><s%> directly <S%H7650><s%> commanded <S%H7650><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> with an oath, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H779><s%> 'Cursed is the man <S%H376><s%> who eats <S%H398><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>'" The people <S%H5971><s%> were faint. <S%H5774><s%>

Then Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "My father <S%H1><s%> has troubled <S%H5916><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%> Please look <S%H7200><s%> how my eyes <S%H5869><s%> have been enlightened, <S%H215><s%> because I tasted <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> of this honey. <S%H1706><s%>

How much more, <S%H637><s%> if perhaps <S%H3863><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> had eaten <S%H398><s%> freely <S%H398><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> of the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> which they found? <S%H4672><s%> For now has there been no great <S%H7235><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> among the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

They struck <S%H5221><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> from Michmash <S%H4363><s%> to Aijalon. <S%H357><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> were very <S%H3966><s%> faint; <S%H5774><s%>

and the people <S%H5971><s%> flew <S%H5860><s%> on the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and cattle, <S%H1241><s%> and calves, <S%H1121><s%> and killed <S%H7819><s%> them on the ground; <S%H776><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> them with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H5971><s%> the people are sinning <S%H2398><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in that they eat <S%H398><s%> meat with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "You have dealt treacherously. <S%H898><s%> Roll <S%H1556><s%> a large <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> to me this day! <S%H3117><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Disperse <S%H6327><s%> yourselves among the people, <S%H5971><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H5066><s%> 'Bring me here every man <S%H376><s%> his ox, <S%H7794><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his sheep, <S%H7716><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> them here, <S%H398><s%> and eat; and don't <S%H2398><s%> sin against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in eating <S%H398><s%> meat with the blood. <S%H1818><s%>'" All the people <S%H5971><s%> brought <S%H5066><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ox <S%H7794><s%> with him <S%H3027><s%> that night, <S%H3915><s%> and killed them there. <S%H7819><s%>
Saul <S%H7586><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> This was the first <S%H2490><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> that he built <S%H1129><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and take spoil <S%H962><s%> among them until the morning <S%H1242><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> and let us not leave <S%H7604><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them. <S%H559><s%>" They said, "Do <S%H6213><s%> whatever seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> to you. <S%H3548><s%>" Then the priest said, <S%H559><s%> "Let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> to God. <S%H430><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> counsel of God, <S%H430><s%> "Shall I go down <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> Will you deliver <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>" But he didn't <S%H6030><s%> answer him that day. <S%H3117><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Draw near <S%H5066><s%> here, <S%H1988><s%> all you chiefs <S%H6438><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> in which <S%H4100><s%> this sin <S%H2403><s%> has been this day. <S%H3117><s%>

For, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh lives, <S%H2416><s%> who saves <S%H3467><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> though it is <S%H3426><s%> in Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> he shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>" But there was not a man among all the people <S%H5971><s%> who answered him. <S%H6030><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "You be on one <S%H259><s%> side, <S%H5676><s%> and I and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> will be on the other <S%H259><s%> side. <S%H5676><s%>" The people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> "Do <S%H6213><s%> what seems <S%H5869><s%> good to you. <S%H2896><s%>"

Therefore Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Show <S%H3051><s%> the right. <S%H8549><s%>" Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> were chosen; <S%H3920><s%> but the people <S%H5971><s%> escaped. <S%H3318><s%>
Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Cast <S%H5307><s%> lots between me and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> my son. <S%H1121><s%>" Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> was selected. <S%H3920><s%>

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> "Tell <S%H5046><s%> me what you have done! <S%H6213><s%>" Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> him, <S%H5046><s%> and said, "I certainly <S%H2938><s%> did taste <S%H2938><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> with the end <S%H7097><s%> of the rod <S%H4294><s%> that was in my hand; <S%H3027><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> I must die. <S%H4191><s%>"
Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> do so <S%H6213><s%> and more also; <S%H3254><s%> for you shall surely <S%H4191><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> Jonathan. <S%H3129><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> "Shall Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> who has worked <S%H6213><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> in Israel? <S%H3478><s%> Far <S%H2486><s%> from it! <S%H3068><s%> As Yahweh lives, <S%H2416><s%> there shall not one hair <S%H8185><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground; <S%H776><s%> for he has worked <S%H6213><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> this day! <S%H3117><s%>" So the people <S%H5971><s%> rescued <S%H6299><s%> Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> that he didn't <S%H4191><s%> die.
Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to their own place. <S%H4725><s%>

Now when Saul <S%H7586><s%> had taken <S%H3920><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> over Israel, <S%H3478><s%> he fought <S%H3898><s%> against all his enemies <S%H341><s%> on every side, <S%H5439><s%> against Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and against Edom, <S%H123><s%> and against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Zobah, <S%H6678><s%> and against the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> and wherever he turned <S%H6437><s%> himself, <S%H7561><s%> he defeated them.

He did <S%H6213><s%> valiantly, <S%H2428><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the Amalekites, <S%H6002><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of those who despoiled them. <S%H8154><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> were Jonathan, <S%H3129><s%> and Ishvi, <S%H3440><s%> and Malchishua; <S%H4444><s%> and the names <S%H8034><s%> of his two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%> were these: <S%H8034><s%> the name of the firstborn <S%H1067><s%> Merab, <S%H4764><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> Michal: <S%H4324><s%>

and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Ahinoam <S%H293><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ahimaaz. <S%H290><s%> The name <S%H8034><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of his army <S%H6635><s%> was Abner <S%H74><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ner, <S%H5369><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s uncle. <S%H1730><s%>
Kish <S%H7027><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Saul; <S%H7586><s%> and Ner <S%H5369><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Abner <S%H74><s%> was the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiel. <S%H22><s%>
